quoteText:
WVUS may, at its sole discretion, modify or revise these Site Terms and policies at any time, and you agree to be bound by such modifications.
Any modifications will be effective immediately upon posting of the revisions on the Site, and you waive any right you may have to receive specific notice of such modifications.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
